name: SOH One Shot Challenge
description:
The world's first unbeatable horror AI: Will you be able to survive The Presence?


Face your deepest fears with this complementary experience to the terrifying world of "Song of Horror". Explore and investigate the Husher mansion to gather clues and items in an attempt to unravel the disappearance of Daniel Noyer. Endure the harrowing tension of the game's atmosphere and try to survive the Presence.

This Halloween, embark on a journey into darkness. Our Challenge promises an experience so terrifying that it's almost impossible to come out alive. Only one player has been able to defeat the Presence in this Challenge. It's time to face your worst nightmares and prove your worth!



You are about to enter an exclusive and limited experience. One Shot Challenge brings the most difficult and merciless setting to the Song of Horror universe.
The game: Song of Horror - Complete Edition is available in 8 languages, with optimized graphics, adjusted difficulty and polished gameplay.
